scripts.test:i:local:
# ローカル環境でのテスト実行（事前に pnpm local:start を実行してください）
pnpm --filter integration-tests test:connection:local && pnpm --filter integration-tests test:local
scripts.test:i:dev:
# 開発環境でのテスト実行
pnpm --filter integration-tests test:connection:dev && pnpm --filter integration-tests test:dev
scripts.test:i:prod:
# 本番環境でのテスト実行
pnpm --filter integration-tests test:connection:prod && pnpm --filter integration-tests test:prod
scripts.deploy:dev: pnpm build && pnpm prepare:deploy && pnpm --filter cbal deploy:dev
scripts.deploy:prod: pnpm build && pnpm prepare:deploy && pnpm --filter cbal deploy:prod
scripts.api:start: pnpm --filter db build && pnpm prepare:deploy && pm2 start --name hono-api 'NODE_ENV=local pnpm --filter=hono-api dev' --watch
scripts.api:stop: pm2 stop hono-api && pm2 delete hono-api
